div.p: To create an expression specifically requesting information that a MedicationRequest intentionally did not occur for a medical, patient or system reason, use the profile QICore-Medicationnotrequested.

pre.code: define "Antithrombotic Therapy at Discharge": ["MedicationRequest": medication in "Antithrombotic Therapy"] Antithrombotic where exists (Antithrombotic.category C where FHIRHelpers.ToConcept(C) in { Global."Community", Global."Discharge" }) and Antithrombotic.status in { 'active', 'completed' } and Antithrombotic.intent.value = 'order'

tr.td: See the patterns page for implementation and usage patterns.
